description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
Enhancements
DIAGRAM-33248 - Add support for Shape.OneD property for all shapes.
DIAGRAM-33137 - [Diagram.DataRecordSets] API to refresh record sets

Task
DIAGRAM-33256 - Support refresh of data in linked shapes for all rendered formats.
DIAGRAM-33255 - Create Demo App to show how to update the data in linked shapes.
DIAGRAM-33254 - Calculating type of provider by connection string to have method Refresh without parameters.
DIAGRAM-33253 - Support possibility to refresh data in linked shapes from MS Excel file.
DIAGRAM-33252 - Support possibility to refresh data in linked shapes from SQL Server database.
DIAGRAM-33251 - Support possibility to refresh data in linked shapes from MS Access database.
DIAGRAM-33250 - Check HTML5 compliance for export to HTML.
DIAGRAM-33249 - Research methods of Automation for data connectivity in Visio.

Bugs
DIAGRAM-33262 - Call out shapes are rendered as black boxes during VSD to PDF conversion
DIAGRAM-33261 - Arrow lines are not properly aligned during VSD to PDF conversion
DIAGRAM-33239 - DiagramExceptions occurs when loading some vdx files.
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
